title: Look at Us!
detail_text: <:th_ch0109/>The day has finally come, Chika-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>So it has, Ruby-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>It’s always so tense right before it starts, huh…. Ruby wonders if everyone will like it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>I’m so happy that all of us could do a live, you know! I’m thrilled!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Fufu, Ruby can feel the happiness from you, Chika-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>I hope everyone that supports us feels the same! Plus, I think we should have more confidence in ourselves. Because we…. cleared.... that hell triathlon that Kanan-chan and Umi-chan made, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Pigii!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Wawa, are you okay, Ruby-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>R-, Ruby is sorry…. When Ruby thinks of it, my heart tenses up…. But that’s right. Even Ruby was able to clear it! So the live will be okay! Let’s make everyone enjoy it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Yeah, yeah! Let’s make it a live to remember for a lifetime-!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
